gherkin_content:
Feature: User Login
  As a user, I want to login to the application using my email and password so that I can access my account

  Background:
    StepKeyword.GIVEN I am a registered user with email "user@example.com" and password "password123"
    StepKeyword.AND I am on the login page

  @smoke @login @happy-path
  Scenario: Successful login with valid credentials
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "password123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see the dashboard page
    StepKeyword.AND I should see a welcome message

  @smoke @login @happy-path
  Scenario: Successful login with remember me option
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "password123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I check the remember me checkbox
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see the dashboard page
    StepKeyword.AND the remember me preference should be saved

  @negative @login @validation
  Scenario: Login fails with invalid email format
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "invalid-email" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "password123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see an error message "Please enter a valid email address"
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page

  @negative @login @validation
  Scenario: Login fails with password less than 8 characters
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "pass" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see an error message "Password must be at least 8 characters"
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page

  @negative @login @error-handling
  Scenario: Login fails with incorrect password
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "wrongpassword123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see an error message "Invalid email or password"
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page

  @negative @login @error-handling
  Scenario: Login fails with unregistered email
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "nonexistent@example.com" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "password123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see an error message "Invalid email or password"
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page

  @negative @login @edge-case
  Scenario: Login fails with empty credentials
    StepKeyword.WHEN I leave the email field empty
    StepKeyword.AND I leave the password field empty
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see an error message "Email and password are required"
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page

  @ui @login
  Scenario: Login UI elements are properly displayed
    StepKeyword.THEN the email field should be visible
    StepKeyword.AND the password field should be visible
    StepKeyword.AND the remember me checkbox should be visible
    StepKeyword.AND the login button should be visible
    StepKeyword.AND the password field should mask input

  @security @login @ui
  Scenario: Password field masks sensitive input
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "password123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.THEN the password field should display masked characters
    StepKeyword.AND the actual password should not be visible
